apexlink:check.description: Validate Apex code in current or passed directories

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

zombie.name: zombie
zombie.description: show warnings for unused fields & methods

depends.name: depends
depends.description: output map of type dependencies rather than issues, CSV or JSON format

namespaces.name: namespaces
namespaces.description: comma separated list of dependent package namespaces (without spaces)

args.name: directory
args.description: directory to search for Apex class files, defaults to current directory
